# ðŸ“‹ CopyLite.js

A tiny and easy copy-to-clipboard utility with zero dependencies.

## ðŸš€ Usage

### 1. In Browser (CDN)

```html
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/ViperDroid/CopyLite.js@main/dist/copylite.min.js"></script>

<script>
  CopyLite.copyToClipboard("Hello, world!");
</script>
